I have not spent too much time playing this game, but I can say with absolute certainty that it is horrible. With that in mind, it is incredibly fun to mess with others in game and get better than the average player to be able to trash talk to oblivion. Trash talking is often seen as a bad side of a game, but in CSGO, Trash talking is the most essential part to its gameplay. You will never get bored of the game with the people you won't ever stop meeting and getting better than. 0/10 completely recommend.
Terrible Garbage game. There is no other game that is worse. Spend you're time elsewhere.

Counter-Strike is one of the greatest games of all time with a gameplay loop that will never make you feel bored. Matchmaking servers are not of the best quality, but many third-party servers and game modes are available. CS is best consumed in a party of 5. Solo-queue is as you would expect it to be in any competitive game - completely hit and miss. I would recommend FaceIt or ESEA. The competitive scene is massive with professional matches going on frequently. Big tournaments even have stickers that you can purchase in-game and slap on your guns to support your favorite players and teams. 10/10 Would recommend.
